text: Sriqyai gaqtvA ni va#rtaqtE &ntA#dEqvA&ntaqmA ra#BatEq na tataqH pApI#yAn Bavati manthya#grAn gRuhNItA-Biqcara#-nnArtapAqtraM ~MvA Eqtad-yan-ma#nthipAqtraM mRuqtyunaiqvaina#M grAhayati tAqjagArtiqmArcCa#tyA-grayaqNAgrA$n gRuhNItaq yasya# piqtA pi#tAmaqhaH puNyaqH syAdathaq tanna prA$pnuqyAd-vAqcA vA EqSha i#ndriqyENaq vyRu#ddhyatEq yasya# piqtA pi#tAmaqhaH puNyOq - [  ] 24
